results.text: Slam to the Brainpan Crit Effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to Intelligence check and Intelligence-based skill checks until healed.
Knocked Cross-eyed The target takes a -2 penalty to all Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-based ability checks and skill checks until healed.
Infection Bonus Effect: The target contracts filth fever (Fortitude negates; Core Rulebook 418).
Spun Around Bonus Effect: The target is flat-footed for 1 round.
Shot to the Vitals Crit Effect: The target is exhausted for 1d4 rounds.
Ring your Bell Crit Effect: The target is staggered for 1d3 rounds.
Low Blow Normal damage. Bonus Effect: The target is sickened for 2d4 rounds.
Torn Ligament Bonus Effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to Strength checks and Strength-based skill checks until healed.
You shot my Toe! Bonus effect: The target is knocked prone.
Trick Shot Crit Effect: Attempt a free dirty trick combat maneuver against the target at the same attack bonus, regardless of range.
Through and Through Crit Effect: Attempt a free sunder combat maneuver against the target at the same attack bonus, regardless of range.
Runaway Bonus Effect: The attack has the automatic weapon special property (Core Rulebook 180).
Bloody Blow Crit Effect: Wound.
Follow Fire Crit Effect: The attack has the line weapon special property.
Bullet With Your Name On It Bonus Effect: The target is shaken for 1 round (Will negates); this is a fear effect.
Hit like a Ton of Bricks Bonus Effect: The target is off-target for 1 round.
Disarming Shot Crit Effect: Attempt a free disarm combat maneuver against the target at the same attack bonus, regardless of range.
Gory Bonus Effect: The target is sickened for 1d6 rounds (Fortitude negates).
Shock and Awe Bonus Effect: The target is staggered for 1 round.
Surprise Opening Crit Effect: The target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents.
Wing Shot Crit Effect: The target's movement speeds are reduced by %50 for 1 minute.
Flurry Fire Bonus Effect: You can apply the effects of covering fire or harrying fire to the target (Core Rulebook 246-247).
Bell Ringer Bonus Effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to Intelligence checks and Intelligence-based skill checks until healed.
Spleen Shot Bonus effect: The target is poisoned (treat as blue whinnis; Core Rulebook 419).
Muscle Damage Crit Effect: The target moves 1 step down the Dexterity poison track (Core Rulebook 415) until healed.
Nose be Gone Bonus Effect: The target moves 1 step down the Charisma poison track (Core Rulebook 415) until healed.
Torn Tendon Bonus Effect: The target moves 1 step down the Strength poison track (Core Rulebook 415) until healed.
Nicked and Artery Bonus Effect: Bleed (1d6/5 levels).
Lodged in the Bone Bonus Effect: Bleed (1d6/10 levels); Medicine checks to stop the bleed damage take a -5 penalty.
Throat Shot Crit Effect: The target cannot breathe or speak. This effect can be removed using the first aid task of the Medicine skill.
Pierced Defences Bonus Effect: The next attack against the target's KAC, if successful, is a critical hit.
Shoot the Chandelier Bonus Effect: Create a square of cover adjacent to you or your target, as if using the Barricade feat (Core Rulebook 155).
Perfect Shot Bonus Effect: You regain 1 resolve point.
Walking Fire Bonus Effect: You can immediately take an additional move action.
Grenade go Boom Bonus Effect One grenade in the target's possession detonates (Reflex negates).
Spun Around Bonus Effect: The target's next attack that misses is rerolled against its nearest ally.
Left Gasping Crit Effect: The target is encumbered for 2d4 rounds.
Cracked Bone Crit Effect: The target is nauseated for 1 round.
Buffeted About Crit Effect: The target is flat-footed for 1d4 rounds.
Eyebrow Bleed Crit Effect: The target is off-target and takes a -5 penalty to Perception checks until healed.
Broken Ribs Bonus Effect: The target cannot benefit from nonmagical healing for 1d4 days.
Bruised and Bloodied Crit Effect: Bleed (1d6/4 levels). The target is staggered for 1 round.
To that Thinky Bits Crit Effect: The target moves 2 steps down the Intelligence poison track (Fortitude save to end each round; Core Rulebook 416).
Shoulder Wound Crit Effect: The target's kinetic attacks deal half damage for 1d3 rounds.
Blinding Hail of Bullets Bonus Effect: You gain concealment (Core Rulebook 253) for 1d4 rounds.
Fin Fillet Bonus Effect: The target loses one form of movement other than land movement until healed.
Vulnerable Spot Crit Effect: The target moves 1 step down the poison track of an ability score of your choice (Fortitude negates; Core Rulebook 415).
Seeing Stars Crit Effect: The target suffers a 20% miss chance for 1d4 rounds.
And Stay Down! Crit Effect: The target is stunned for 1 round (Fortitude negates) and knocked prone.
Spalling Crit Effect: Bleed (1d6/5 levels). The target's KAC is reduced by 2 until healed.
Grazing Hit Normal damage. Bonus Effect: The target is stunned for 1 round.
Sucking Chest Wound Crit Effect: The target is exhausted until healed (Fortitude negates).
Shrapnel by the Bone Crit Effect: The target suffers a 20% chance of being stunned each round for 2d6 rounds.
